name: Defending Arsland
description:
Game made for the Mix And Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours.

Instructions-

Select card by clicking on it -

The wall can only be placed on on the path and all the towers cannot be placed on the path. Also you cannot build a building to far away from the player.

You can use the slow enemy to slow down the enemies and teleport to teleport.

You can upgrade your towers and sell and buy items and skip while it is your chance.

Objective-

Don't let the enemies reach the castle, kill them before reaching the castle.

Game made by - 

Tomer Orian (Tomer) - Programmer

Parth Sovani (Insane) - Programmer

Álvaro Colom (Trikyname) - Game Designer

Barbara Silva (Berrybii) - Artist

Skid85 - Sound Designer
